archdesc.runner: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.physdesc: 1 original watercolor on paper; 23 x 16 cm.
did.abstract: The collection consists of a framed and matted full color pen-and-ink watercolor illustration for the chapter "Longnose the Dwarf" in a new edition of The Fairy Ringpublished by Doubleday in 1967.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Warren Chappell Watercolor "Longnose the Dwarf," Accession #10204-at, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The drawing was purchased by the University of Virginia Library from Oak Knoll Books, New Castle, Delaware, on November 28, 1995.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This addition to the Warren Chappell Collection consists of a framed and matted original full color pen-and-ink watercolor drawing signed by American illustrator Warren Chappell (1904-1991). The illustration is from the chapter entitled "Longnose The Dwarf" in The Fairy Ringedited by Kate Douglas Wiggin and Nora Archibald Smith which was published by Doubleday in 1967.
